channel.title: self on Kev's 9th blog
channel.description: Recent content in self on Kev's 9th blog

item.title: Happy Valentine's Day, My Love
item.description: Today is Valentine’s Day. I am happy after got acupuncture treatment. Wife is happy because of these beautiful tulips. Daughter is happy because of these candy grams. I’m really happy for you, my love(s).

item.title: Where I’m From
item.description: I am from old fashion sewing machine, from an aged bicycle and an old popsicle. I am from the brand new muddy house, small, warm, not enough room to live. I am from the tall green elm tree that I fell out of, but luckily I am still alive. I’m from the Mah-jongg game at every single new year eve and crafty veterans of it. From Loong and YuZhou. I’m constantly moving from one place to another and back.
